# color

**Instance Property**

The base color for the tile map. The influence of the color over the tile map node’s textures is controlled by [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileMapNode/colorBlendFactor].

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var color: UIColor { get set }
```

```swift
@MainActor var color: NSColor { get set }
```

```swift
var color: UIColor { get set }
```

## Tinting a Tile Map

- **colorBlendFactor**: Controls the blending between the texture and the tile map object’s [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileMapNode/color]. Values are clamped between zero and one where zero has no color blending and one has the maximum color blending.
